website_summaries.verdict: Designed for long-distance runs, the Saucony Triumph ISO 5 offers a good balance of cushioning, comfort, fit, and performance. The shoe has gathered mixed reviews from its users. Others find the shoe satisfying because of its responsive cushioning, while a few are disappointed because of the limited traction it offers. Despite the mixed feedback, the majority still thinks that the Triumph ISO 5 delivered a significant improvement over the 4th version.
pros: Several runners admired the breathable coverage of the Saucony Triumph ISO 5
A few mentioned that the shoe offers the right amount of support they needed while running
Some users expressed satisfaction over the shoe’s soft and responsive cushioning
they said they run without sacrificing too much energy
Many wearers lauded the shoe’s comfortable fit
The Triumph ISO 5 has a roomy toe box and a few runners were happy with it
A couple of purchasers are pleased with the premium build of the shoe
cons: Narrow-footer runners found the forefoot to be too wide for their measurement
The traction of the outsole is lacking on wet surfaces, some users complained

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy road running shoes, good for marathon
customer_reviews.text: Very, very comfy shoes. I ran a half marathon in these (21km) and for the first time, my knees doesn't hurt. Amazing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Very snug, soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I have bad knees so I bought these as I was advised by professional runners that they are the max comfort and padding you can get for reducing the impact on your knees. These definately help. I have been using them for the last 4 months and I can definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate road running cushions
customer_reviews.text: So so much more cushioned than and other trainer I have tried. I'm a big guy and 6ft 4 and these cushion so much better than any other top line trainer I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: gordon anderson

customer_reviews.title: Running in these has made my runs more enjoyable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ive just started running this year and decided to invest into some running shoes after suffering blisters and the ground feeling to hard with my trainers I was using. These are Very comfortable and cushioned well worth money if your running that bit further and taking running a little bit more seriously or want to enjoy your runs more without the aches and pains
customer_reviews.author: Rikki

customer_reviews.title: These will improve your running for sure
customer_reviews.text: These are my preferred running trainers and I have 12 pairs of trainers but I perform the best in these.
customer_reviews.author: MR S A BURKE

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainer
customer_reviews.text: My only concern with these is that they came in an unbranded box which made me slightly suspicious. Other than this they are good comfy trainers for running in
customer_reviews.author: Simon L

customer_reviews.title: My best running shoes to date
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove ( just like they were made to measure) very good cushioning especially as I'm a big guy.
customer_reviews.author: Superfly

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The most comfy running shoes I’ve ever bought. Fit is a little big but doesn’t effect me when running. Grip isn’t amazing when it rains but for general usage these are brilliant. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eamon Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really good running trainer. Really comfortable and provide support when running. First time I have purchased Saucony trainers I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Robert Sheath

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable mile-eaters.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a shoe that could soak-up the training miles and got what I asked for. These manage to be pillow-soft without changing your gait. You won't want to run (or even walk) in anything else once you've tried them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I do 5-8mile runs and they are ideal. Lightweight and very comfortable and excellent cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Confortable
customer_reviews.text: Soft and comfortable. But the support is not as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Yh

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Happy with these trainers, very comfortable and ran great straight out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Jasey

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and lift of a proper running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent comfort and lift. Just what you need from a shoes of this category.
customer_reviews.author: Syed

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoes I have ever had and I run about 3000k oer year. Excellent support, inner sole and grip
customer_reviews.author: Alex Nieuwpoort

product_meta.title: Saucony Men's Triumph Iso 5 Competition Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Long travel with first class ticket For those who want the ultimate in cushioning, the TRIUMPH ISO 5 is our most comfortable model yet, giving you everything you need to go through the longest races.
